eye.name: eye
eye.transformationDescription:
By the time [npc.she] hesitantly [npc.verb(open)] them again, they've changed and quadrupled into spider-like eyes, with the two largest located where [npc.her] former eyes were in the centre of [npc.her] face.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldSpider(spider-like eyes)] of a solid [npc.irisColour(true)] colour.
eye.bodyDescription: [npc.SheHasFull] [npc.eyePairs] spider-like eyes, with two larger ones located where a human's would be and the rest spread across [npc.her] forehead and the sides of [npc.her] head. They are a reflective, solid [npc.irisColour(true)] colour.
